apis.description: The Nokia User Interface API provides some advanced drawing functionalities.
apis.names:
nokia-ui,nokiaui, nokiauiapi nokia-ui.jar, nokiaui.zip
import/nokia-ui.jar
Mobile Media API The Mobile Media API provides functionalities for playing and capturing sounds and videos.
mmapi,mm-api j2me-mmapi.jar, mma.zip import/j2me-mmapi.jar
Wireless Messaging API The Wireless Messaging API provides functionalities for sending and receiving messages (SMS).
wmapi,wm-api j2me-wmapi.jar, wma.zip import/j2me-wmapi.jar
Bluetooth API The Bluetooth API provides functionalities for data exchange with other bluetooth devices.
btapi,bt-api, bluetooth, bluetooth-api j2me-btapi.jar, bluetooth.zip import/j2me-btapi.jar
